title: # 287 - Kevin Brennan, Eddie Ifft, & ME
description:
I sit down in the mancave with Kevin Brennan and Eddie Ifft to talk about death threats, SNL, late night shows, Kevin's beef with Neal, and much more!

Follow Kevin on twitter @KevinBrennan666

Follow Eddie on twitter @eddieifft 

 

There is a link to donate to my daughter Georgia's gofundme to help install refillable water bottle stations at her school at www.wifeotp.com 

This episode is brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, sexual wellness, for men. To get started for just $5 go to www.forhims.com/bertcasted

This episode is also brought to you by Beach Body. For your free 30 day trial membership text Bert to 303030

This episode is also brought to you by Leesa Mattresses. Try 100 nights risk free and get $125 off of a Leesa Mattress by going to www.leesa.com/bertcast
